content: the texture is truly squishable in this inviting super-cuddly crochet blanket made with our plush bernat blanket extra thick this beginner-friendly pattern alternates single and double_crochet stitches to create a nubbly textured fabric reminiscent of citrus skin keep it as designed or explore your imagination to create this quick and wonderful throw in any color that works in your space yarn for model bernat® blanket extra thick™ 21 2 oz/600 g 72 yds/66 m gold 62013 5 balls or 340 yds/311 m
